mapper.select: SELECT ingredient.id as id, ingredient.type as type, ingredient.source as source, ingredient.inportDate as importDate, ingredient.factoryId as factoryId, ingredient.amount as amount FROM ingredient INNER JOIN orderItem_ingredient ON ingredient.id = orderItem_ingredient.ingredientId INNER JOIN orderItem ON orderItem_ingredient.orderItemId = orderItem.id WHERE orderItem.orderId = #{orderId}
SELECT ingredient.type ,sum(ingredient.amount) as amount from ingredient INNER JOIN factory ON ingredient.factoryId = factory.id WHERE factory.id = #{factoryId} GROUP BY ingredient.type

SELECT ingredient.id as id, ingredient.type, ingredient.source, ingredient.inportDate, ingredient.amount, factory.id as factoryId, factory.name, factory.address, factory.longitude, factory.latitude, factory.phoneNum, factory.businessTimeFrom, factory.businessTimeTo, ingredientThreshold.threshold from ingredient INNER JOIN factory ON ingredient.factoryId = factory.id INNER JOIN ingredientThreshold ON ingredientThreshold.type = ingredient.type WHERE ingredient.type = #{type} and factory.id = #{factoryId}
